body: Damn it was wild reading y'all conversation like it's a fucking time capsule. Anyway this doujin pretty banger imo
Dam I just finished reading all the defloration doujin. Well I guess I done for a while.
Hentai has just become boring now. I'll probably check back in a year to see if anything good has decided to be made. You eventually get bored reading the same doujins over again.
Really?
No. Not lately. I've read pretty much all the thing's that peak my interest and now I just hit random and try to find underrated doujins that I probably missed.
I guess so, seen any good hentai lately?

Necessarily not passion, I just have a shitton to say about this. It's so stupid. Like these dudes really made name's for the people that comment. like NTR'cucks and VanillaFag's like the fucking east and the west NV shit. It's a word but some people take it seriously like its a direct insult to them specifically. It's so dumb realizing what these dudes argue about now.
Oh wow it seems you are very passionate about this

Yes it has been. In my personal opinion that's pretty fucking dumb. It's Just the fact that people argue over a mere drawing like it's their own life problem's. I figured out arguing online is completely irrational and stupid, What do you get out of that? You literally are just typing on a keyboard to another person in hopes of what. Hurting their feelings? Like its so dumb I cant explain it. Like how the fuck is cyber bullying a thing. Like nigga turn off the computer. Walk away from the screen. Like I said arguing online is dumb, Im dumb as fuck since I used to be a complete Keyboard warrior and now realizing I have way better things in life then just sit on my ass and argue about, "Oh wow this character got cucked by a big brolic black dude named requis" Like its fiction, it's not cannon calm the hell down. Some thing's don't fit my taste's. But I don't go on a hissyfit Screaming how this doujin is utter trash and how the author should kill themselves.
Hey it's been some time I've been looking at NTR comments and seen how heated they have been getting what are your thoughts?
Write me some numbers I need some

And for that nigga AbusivePlagueDoctor its probably the same situation as mine, I don't know. Unless you get a direct response from him My point is the top answer here but, I don't even know. Be my guest.

Well man listen,1 I joined the site when it wasn't as big as a meme as it is now, and new doujins were popping out like crazy since the shows I liked we're still running for the time being, The time I joined thats probably when the best doujins and manga were coming out in my opinion, Back then I also would find hella good doujins that fit specifically to my tastes. I.E Yuri's of shows like, LittleWitchAcademia. Misaki doujins that were actually good, funny how people are starting to know the character now but I was on that shit before the start of time. But the list goes on. 2 I've already commented on the good doujins that I like. I'll comment on things that I like but thats pretty damn rare because there's so much niggas on this site now since nhentai has become so much of a fucking mainstream things with. "CaN i HaVe tHe SaUcE" Shit in the comments and sacred numbers type shit. But. It is what it is.
Hey you dont comment much more on nhentai doujins whats up with that and also other people ive seen like abusiveplaguedoctor
Ah hes fine, I don't really like to dwell in peoples businesses, I let em be. if it aint affecting me in a way
You seen that one dude DRNTR? hes pretty damn toxic ive seen
Ah ok alright then, there is definitely some notorious users on nhentai i'll give you that
Ok umm lets talk about the people on this site since hella people are toxic for no reason
Understandable. You make the calls here though since I can probably answer every question you got if it's about the site
Well we dont have anything to talk about anymore since what we talking about is old now
Yup Like i've said.
Well I guess you were right you know everything about this site
I've seen that one before thats stuck in the vault too. It's pretty damn crazy aint it? and you can see people actually like it in the comments so like I said.
Im back and i got something for you to see 89057 is the one i went far too see if i can find the worst doujin i can find
I doubt that, like i've said i been around this site so ill be surprised if you come back with something ive never seen before. Ill be waiting though
damn then alright nigga ill come back and hit you with some bad doujins you've never seen before

I can sit down here and type hella bad doujins for hours. But here's one of them I read. You know those plain gore doujins/mangas like 228922? found another one and i think this one is worse than 228922. I don't remember the number and I don't plan on searching the site for the doujin because the cover on it is heinous but the numbers are probably chilling in my bad numbers vault somewhere. But the doujin is just plain gore. pulling out intestines and gore everywhere like a Rob Zombie movie. Necessarily I don't really get scarred from doujins but that shit had me in a different vibe for a couple of day's. It's kinda hard to think that someone would draw that. Thinking bout that shit give me chill's.
I mean you do have a point.. just let some niggas do they own things anymore bad doujins you know?

Yeah i've seen it all over the place. People on nhentai are fucked up but I just let it slide. Niggas grease their monkeys to some weird shit, it doesn't affect me in some way so I let them do they own things.
alright then since some people are into that shit believe that? I can't really believe people actually like gore

No No Im not into that, I just wen't around the darkest corners of this website and wrote down the numbers and vaulted them. Yeah believe it or not I cant jerk off to hentai, Its a damn drawing so I can't really you know? I Just love reading the stories that they got and shit like that. Its tight
damn nigga that had to be one hellavu doujin to read   i don't really try to stick around that shit because i aint into that shit

Oh shit, my memory is a bit foggy but I think the worst one i've read is probably this one where this humanoid thing that i refereed to as "a bootleg scp 096" or something like that, and it escapes from this place and skull fucks and somehow murders every girl there with his dick, It was so fucking gory dude like holy shit.
well then tell me what's one of the worst hentais youve read before since you know the bad links and good links huh
You've read guro and snuff before? Boy do I have some shit to tell you because ive been around this site.
Anything really that doesn't piss me off or leave a bad taste in my mouth like some netorares guro snuff shit like that
Ah ok. What's your favorite tags dude if we're gonna kick this conversation I guess.
nope not really been on this site for a while just made this account because i just said fuck it why not
Who would've thought so, Anyway's is this the first time on the site?
No don't even trip about it we can just talk about hentai since we on a fucking hentai site
Oh really? damn like now we got nothing to talk about now.
Nah man im in here now it aint as lonely
Just me, myself and I, on a pretty decent doujin. Damn it be lonely up in here
